english.segment1: Wherever the wind blows, You will find me there. Standing exactly where I wanna be
english.segment2: I hear a Voice in the autumn breeze telling me that I need to leave. But I can't fly with these broken wings. The leaves, they move like poetry, it's all still such a mystery. But I can finally hear the Melody
english.segment3: I've been here for so long, I think it's time I moved on. So tell me where it is that I need to be
english.segment4: Wasting time here is killing me, waiting here for the Remedy. So I can hear the sound of angels sing
english.segment5: I need Something to carry me to a Place that I've never seen. 'Cause right here I've seen all there is to see
english.segment6: I've been here for so long, I think its time I moved on. So tell me where it is that I need to be
english.segment7: I've been waiting, waiting for the day. So can You carry me away?. You elevate me, how far can You take me, carry me away?.
